[[File:Nancy Martsch.jpg|thumb|Nancy Martsch at [[The Return of the Ring]], 2012]]
'''Nancy Martsch''' is the editor of ''[[Beyond Bree]]''. She also edits the [[Beyond Bree (calendar)|Beyond Bree calendars]].

==Bibliography==
===Books===
*[[1992]]: ''[[Basic Quenya]]''
*[[2014]]: ''[[Tolkien in the New Century|Tolkien in the New Century: Essays in Honor of Tom Shippey]]'' (co-editor)
===Articles===
*[[1984]]: [[Beyond Bree December 1984|''Beyond Bree'' December 1984]]
**"The Cirth Numerals" & "The Names of the Numbers"
*[[1991]]: [[Mallorn 28|''Mallorn'' 28]]
**"How to learn Elvish"
*[[1995]]: ''[[Proceedings of the J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference]]''
**"A Tolkien Chronology"
*[[1997]]: [[Beyond Bree April 1997|''Beyond Bree'' April 1997]]
**"Tolkien's Reading"
*[[2008]]: ''[[The Ring Goes Ever On: Proceedings of the Tolkien 2005 Conference]]''
**"The Ace Copyright Affair"
*[[2011]]: [[Mallorn 52|''Mallorn'' 52]]
**"Consider the context" (guest editorial)
*[[2013]]: ''[[Tolkien's Poetry]]''
** "Tolkien's Poetic Use of the Old English and Latinate Vocabulary: A Study of Three Poems from The Adventures of Tom Bombadil"
*[[2014]]: ''[[Tolkien in the New Century|Tolkien in the New Century: Essays in Honor of Tom Shippey]]''
**"The 'Lady with the Simple Gown and White Arms' ''or'' Possible Influences of 19th and Early 20th Century Book Illustrations on Tolkien's Work"
*[[2019]]: ''[[Music in Tolkien's Work and Beyond]]''
**"Middle-earth Improv: Song Writing and Improvisation in Tolkien's Works"
